## Barcelona Approach Control for West configuration (WRL) (Used at day) 
## Arrival planes must follow the STARS (the green lines) to the IAFs (SLL, CLE, RULOS and LESBA)
## After the IAFs, the planes will join the holding pattern if no instructions are provided,
## So you can instruct the planes to enter the RNAV transitions before they reach de IAFs
## (The RANV transitions are the ones that begin at the IAFs)
## After flying the RNAV transitions, the planes will continue flying an infinite downwind if no vectors provided

## Data from ENAIRE AIP and ENAIRE INSIGNIA, coordinates converted with e6bx.com
## Version updated on 22/july/2021
## Original file created by AndreuAviation
## Contact: email: andrivaotv@gmail.com // Discord: AndreuAviation#7593
## MRVA, TRANSITIONS and ATZ/CTR circle: created by Diego Aranjuelo
